I first tried a different water fountain that my cat just hasn't taken to.Based on past experience with two other fountains, I'm glad I've finally discovered this one, which he was drinking from immediately.I would definitely recommend this item to friends.

So far I have found all claims made by the manufacturer to be quite true, and reliable. Clumps great, scoops easy, and dust free, controls odor an easy 10 plus days, provided you scoop daily. Also this litter tracks the least of all other brands I've used thus far. I also love that Amazon will ship this directly to my front door, and free shipping when it's available in Prime! This works for me!!!

I have a stray cat that adopted me. Unfortunately he came down with an upper respiratory infection, and a viral eye infection. I was informed by my veterinarian, that feeding him this product was essential for aiding good health.Thank goodness cats find this very palatable, my cat thinks they are his kitty treats. This company is producing the best items for improving, and maintaining the health of cats, which like mine has become compromised. Vertri also makes an eye wash, which I use to keep his eyes clean, to help diffuse the itching and burning that accompanies this viral eye infection. Without these two products I fear my cat would otherwise not stand a chance at living a happy, healthy life.

Aidan's love for Amelia grows stronger by the hour.  He will fight and face any obstacle in the world as long as he can help her heal and keep her safe.  Their journey together to fulfill the prophecy is just beginning.This is an exciting and immensely creative book.  Although I am not into fantasy or paranormal, this series has been a high point in my reading.  The creative plotline, characters, and writing style immediately drew me in.Although this third book in the series resolves many of the questions and issues facing our characters, the author does leave room for more stories in the future.  I can hardly wait to read what she comes up with next!

Jacob is going against all his rules. He has allowed a level of intimacy creep into his relationship with Vivienne and he regrets it. He is so consumed with his feelings for her. The struggle to keep her at arm's length is almost lost.Jacob's dark secrets continue to haunt everyone. I am dying to know what it is that he is hiding from Vivienne. What could possibly be so bad about his past that he feels her innocence is in jeopardy if he discloses his past?This author's stories are classy and steamy all at the same time. The love scenes between Jacob and Vivienne are incendiary. Their passion and struggle for the Dom/sub relationship is prevalent in and out of the playroom. Tempers flare, emotions cannot be denied, and Jacob continues to be that mercurial lover that unsettles everything.

I just finished it and I am in awe, shock... and have to admit, it has a fitting end.Dark and a with a lot of a razor sharp edge, Deanna's life continues to run in the parallels of two lives - what she dreams she could be as the "camgirl"  and her real broken self.  Her love affair with Jeremy is part of that dream world, where she gets to play normal.  But, alas, normal is not for her.  It is not real.  She has to deal with her own broken self.  It is a miracle that she understands this and tries to control the shards of her brain that broke that fateful night her family died,I cannot say much about the plot... but if you have read the previous two books, you can count that you will be amazed by the twists and turns our author has come up with this time.  I sat at the edge of my seat and could not put this book down.Do not expect an HEA.  This is a dark and haunting story.  The ending may not be what you expect in fairy tales, but let's face it, this is a very dark and disturbed character we are dealing with.  Maybe this is her unique HEA!
Greatest invention ever!  Now you can fax on any type of computer as long as you can plug this gadget in to one of your USB ports.  Portable so I can switch between my desktop and my laptop.

The conditioner is great and can be left in to continue improving your hair.  The shampoo does leave the hair a bit sticky and the scent is not so much Lavender but a bit barbazol.  I was given a sample to test.

All these shampoos and conditioners with this brand name are wonderful.  I am also using the one with the Arojan oil and it is great for my hair.  The scent is delicate and refreshing.  My hair is thankful I found this product.  So you know, I was given a sample to test.

Wonderful oils.  The one for the body leaves the skin nice and smooth.  I am looking forward to using it this Winter.  The one for the hair smells delish and is not heavy on the hair.  So you know, I was given a sample to test.
I have been using this gadget and boy what a difference.  The sound is clear and crisp.  Hands free was never this good!  Just so you know, I was given a sample to test.
Wonderful product for my old feet!  Great for buffing and keeping my feet nice looking.  Just so you know, I was given a sample to test.
What can I say about Quilted... it is so soft!

What a wonderful invention for those of us who still have all these cords to contend with.  I had  my daughter gather them together and organize them neatly.  Now, we have this slick looking sleeve with the chords inside nothing is getting tangled.  I am so glad I found this.  Just to let you know, I was given a sample to test.

4.5 out of 5 StarsHas anyone ever been able to control falling in love?  That's right, impossible! Call it pheromones, chemistry, fate... whatever, the attraction is there unrelenting and seeking to fulfill our need to find our other half that completes us.Lucy and Drake are like this from the moment they met in person.  This was no simple crush or infatuation.  It was like they could look at each other and know they had found the one and only.  Their courtship was on steroids from that moment on as far as Drake was concerned.  He did not have much time for courtship with the election around the corner.  Besides, there was no way he was going to lose the girl he had been seeking all his life.Life does complicate things a bit.  Not knowing each other very well, there are secrets that have been hidden and must reluctantly surface.  That is where our story gets complex and will tear your heart apart.Our author has a direct and clear style in her writing.  No frills, you get the story straight from her heart.  This is a romance you read to feel hopeful there is hope in this world.

Laugh! Cry! Swoon!These three words signify the writing style of our author. She will make you go through all these emotions as she tells you a story that you will not soon forget. Not everyone has the gift of humor in their story telling. After reading the THAT MAN series, I know that nothing is impossible, humor can be found in the most everyday things, and the male characters this author writes about will make you swoon and dream about them.Unforgettable is the story of a Hollywood actor who has been declared by People magazine as "The Sexiest Man Alive". No words can describe the carnal attraction he oozes,but our author successfully brings him to life. Well, almost totally alive. He is just a little out of it after he was found like road kill by the side of the road after someone hit him while he was jogging. Only the efforts of this good samaritan, Zoe who happens to be his personal assistant, are able to keep him alive. In a coma for days, part of his memory missing and finding himself engaged to the most obnoxious of girlfriends is just the beginning. Take the journey with Brandon and Zoe as they attempt to piece together his memory and keep him from going over the edge with his fiancee.The story is told in 3 books, releasing one month apart... so I am waiting eagerly for the next part of this story. I have my suspicions and love a mystery, especially when the man at the center of the action is Brandon Taylor!

This is an amazing anthology of stories I will treasure!Focusing on my favorite... Paradise Tempted by L.B. Dunbar now. I hope and pray she is writing a series based on this novella. It is seductive, emotional, complex, passionate...I have a vivid imagination and can see all kinds of possibilities based this story. Cain and Sofie have a link that grabbed me right away. Their lives are complicated and both have commitments they cannot avoid or disregard. Yet, for time they are together, a new world has opened for both of them.Our author sure has a plotline here that has the makings of a fantastic romantic series!

Reading this book, I was ready to bite my nails.  Haley has been through so much already because of Jude, I was hoping now that he was dead she could find her way to happiness.Dustin and Becca are concerned for her.  She has stopped seeing a therapist, is trying so hard to rebuild her life, but still appears fragile and out of sorts.  Things keep happening that can only make her wonder if she is finally unravelling.  Did she make the bed this morning?  She thought she had, but why is it a mess now in the early afternoon?  Why was the front door unlocked?  She always checked, didn't she?  She continues to feel insecure and keeps thinking and obsessing about Jude all day.Masterfully written, you will not be able to stop reading.  I recommend you carve yourself a block of time to dedicate to reading this.  If you are cooking while reading this book, the food will burn.  You will not want to do anything other than follow this story to its shocking conclusion.

To a lover, an intimate kiss can mean everything. When a relationship is young and you have not shared how you feel about each other, an intimate kiss will relay the depth of your emotions, that connection that spurs bonding, lust, and ultimately helps the lovers transcend the mundane and primal urges.A BDSM relationship does not revolve around the depth of romantic emotions. It revolves around trust, respect and the connection that makes the power exchange between the participants the ultimate high. As far as Jacob is concerned, the emotions he feels for Vivienne will only ruin the Dom/sub link they are trying to create.Vivienne is totally clueless as to what is required for this type of relationship. All she knows is how she feels toward Jacob. She is jealous of any woman that touches or seems to flirt with him. Feeling so inadequate to hold on to Jacob, her emotions get the best of her.I love the interplay between this couple as they attempt to create a relationship. Jealousy, domination, possessiveness and control all come to play as they attempt to build the trust needed to further their relationship. As always, I cannot get enough of this story. Now I am waiting patiently for the next installment. Only two weeks to go!

Call it destiny, life's little twists, Karma, serendipity... but sometimes you are presented with situations where what you decide to do will shape the rest of your life.Beth is just trying to recuperate from the scandal her soon-to-be-husband has created.  Little did she know he has been cheating on her for the past four years of their married life.  It is true he is a country rock star, but he made vows to stay true to her and their love.  Over thirty women have come forward with details of their affair with Troy and the paparazzi has been relentless.  Now, a chance meeting with Jonah Masters, while she is on an outing with her best friends, is nothing short of serendipitous.  Jonah has been her friend for years, after all he and his band of Rowdy Boys used to tour as the opening act for her soon-to-be-ex three years ago.  They spend the night together, not as you would usually expect, and that turns into two nights and a day shared.  Their destinies are entwined, but the timing is off.Amazingly emotional and complex, Beth's and Jonah's story will tug at your heart and soul.  Well written with a strong dose of reality, their story is unforgettable as romance goes.  I promise you not a dry tear in the house for those who read this poignant story.Although each story in the Outback Bachelor Ball series is a standalone, I found that reading them in order gave me an extra bonus of understanding.  However you read them, they are worth their weight in gold!

These boys are the ultra macho, ultra alpha, and ultra sexy end-all. They are rough, tough, and full of unbridled passion. Each of their stories are included here.  They each finally find their match to soften their rough edges and teach them that love and monogamy is not a bad thing.These stories stand out as a brilliant depiction of their various personalities and somewhat alarming view of love and relationships. Absolutely a must read if you like it rough and hard. These boys do not filter their thoughts or language. Not for the faint of heart... but they are still adorable!In addition, we have a bonus story about Momma Joe.  After losing her husband, a man she gave up everything for, she has struggled to raise her boys to be men his father would have been proud of.  She has worked her fingers to the bone for her sons, their wives, and her grandchildren.  Now, it is time for her to look around, enjoy life, and perhaps find someone with whom she can share the rest of her life?  Her story will make you laugh, cry and finally cheer. The complications of dating when you are older and your children are grown will bring tears of laughter to readers.

4.5 out of 5 StarsHaving been dump by her boyfriend has left Jen totally insecure about men and forever love.  In this sweet and passionate story, she is double dared into stepping out of her secure and pragmatic world to let her hair down for one night.  Little did she know the consequences of such an act would have on the rest of her life.Retired Special Forces Logan Turner is just looking to relax and take breath after his service to his country.  All he wants is an uncomplicated life and perhaps a wife and kids to go with it.  Not sure what his future will bring, he agrees to help his sister by providing security to an outback Bachelors and Spinsters Ball for a couple of hours.  Little did he know he would be called to assist and protect a passionate, complicated and intriguing woman who would steal his heart.Love-at-first-sight does not exist... right?  What happens when the chemistry is undeniable and the bond they forge is stronger than geography?  Something's gotta give!Once again this author's story has left me with a permanent smile on my face.  That is how I know I have been thoroughly entertained.  I welcome more stories and smiles in my future from this author.

She fell in love with him when she was barely fourteen years old.  He was nineteen and he was hired as a ranch hand at her father's cattle ranch.  They had always been friends through all the ups and downs of the last fourteen years.  And now it is time to "fish or cut bait" ... is this a love that is shared by two or is she the only one with these feelings.This is an entertaining and delightful story of Ellie and Rick.  It quickly draws you in to the emotions that have been simmering below the surface all this time.  The cowboy has to finally make up his mind as to what his future is going to look like.  Ellie is very independent, but she is solid about her feelings and willing to give Rick a last chance.  Loved this delightful story!

It all started with someone offering me a copy of Darling Sheriff... and I have not been able to put this series down!  Yep!  I read the three books published so far all during this weekend.  Now I have to wait to wait to see what happens to Alex!  It's OK!  I have life commitments (yeah, remember those?) and I need to clean my house.  Ha ha ha!  It was just not happening while I was reading this series!I love that this story is about the four college girlfriends but it does not follow the normal format.  Their stories are being told simultaneously so we a to understand their lives simultaneously and how life intertwines for them.  We have sexy men, d**chebags, ill-intentioned idiots and heroes.  We have sexy, passionate scenes, but most of all, we have romance and mystery!  Some characters will make you pray for Justice to come with that sword wielding death, while others you will cheer and encourage out of their shells toward happiness.Amazing story, amazing writing!  So glad I discovered Faris O'Neill!!

ove chooses you ... there is very little we can do when our hearts take the leap. It does not matter whether it is practical, part of our plans, or even good for us. When we encounter our special someone we just should embrace this gift with open arms.Gabe Colt has been keeping secrets. As a famous movie star and producer, he has to play the Hollywood game and appear to be sexy and available. With the shocking news being spread about on the gossip rags he knew it would not take long for the entire family to be in an uproar. Was this the right time to come clean and disclose all his secrets to both his family and the public? Has AJ already paid the price his fame has exacted on him and his secrets? His little girl is lost and needs him to step up and take responsibility.These stores will surprise you. Masterfully weaved, they are the stories of the children of Gabe and Chris, two men who have kept the paparazzi away from their children and their homosexual partnership as secret as possible .  The first book  is the dual story of AJ and her struggle to find her identity and the story of Gabe and the cost of his rise to success. The decisions our characters make have consequences that have distorted and shaped all their futures. The loving family they all hoped to have has disintegrated into a farce that has shaped their destinies into something they never wanted. They must all face the truth no matter how difficult it may be and finally take responsibility for their actions.The rest of the stories are just as sensitive, emotional, and engrossing.  You will not want to put them down. I highly recommend it. The depth and complexity of these stories which only proves what an amazing author Claudia Burgoa is.

"What harm could come of fulfilling his longtime sexual fantasy?"Famous last words from a lawyer who should know better than to ask a question to which he does not know the answer.  He is caught in his twenty-year marriage's mental aura. After twenty years you think you know the person you are married to.  You try not get too comfortable and always keep the relationship exciting.  How do you really know you have met your goal?Reality is usually our perception of what goes on around us.  When we least expect it, the veil that covers our eyes is lifted and we are left staring at reality in the face.  What we do then will shape the future ...This is not an autopsy of a marriage.  I would say it is a long-delayed, wellness check-up that produces surprises and realigns the status of a marriage. Amazingly well-written, with an intelligent plot line, you will not be satisfied until you have turned the last page.

Lifelong friends who know everything about you are the best group to be with when your own life is in danger.  Bonding as teenagers, these high strong characters give each other strength, laughter, and most of all the affection of a self-made family that is stronger than blood.Without realizing, these four couple who are not really a couple, have made their love choices, while staying away from changing their friendship.  You can tell that one by one, these couples will have to deal with the fact that sometimes friendship has to grow into something even more intimate and you must take that risk.This first story of the Brass series focuses on Savannah and Noah.  Their friendship has slowly but surely come to the boiling point.  With Noah being a DEA agent and Savannah being an Assistant US Attorney, their paths are forever entwining.  When her life is in peril because of a case they are both working on, Noah has no other alternative than edge closer to the inevitable - letting his love for Savannah flourish.This is a thrilling and suspenseful story full of romance.  The plotline will keep you glued to this book as well as the characters' journey into love.  I can hardly wait until the next book comes out.  Which couple will be next?
For it a lip stain, it does not last long.
Working like a charm!  Very versatile for computer users that want to ensure power surges will not place their rig at risk.

Having broken up with Jacob on their first official date, Vie is just devastated. Actually, he is the one that dumped her without giving her a chance to explain why she cried.Vie is both angry and heartbroken wondering why his demeanor changed and decided to leave her. Not even a kiss. Why?This story is going to be complex from Jacob's reaction. He has deep secrets which he never shares with anyone. You can tell he needs the control in order to calm the demons in his mind. What happened to him to make him this way. None of the other Rinaldi men are like this. Gianni is controlling and into this lifestyle, but he does not have the same demons chasing him. Guess we will have to read more about Jacob to find out what drives him.As always, the author is leading us through a maze of passion and lust. Vie is so inexperienced you can only hope she will be able to grow and handle Jacob. Perhaps with her gentle ways he will learn to love.

4.5 out of 5 Fangs for this one~Their fangs are showing!I am not into vampires, but I received a copy of this book from the author and decided to read it.  I love all her other books.  She has a way of creating characters that are hard to forget.Now this book has me with mixed feelings.  I do not like vampires, but yet she has a very interesting plotline going here.  There is the usual attraction to the scent and figure of the vampire by the prey.  Unusual is the fact that Alasdair is willing to delay feeding because of the heightened rush of the anticipation.  When he finally bites his prey... things become very unusual.  I won't spoil it for you.There is a mystery to resolve!  The Ancients are in peril!  The well-being of the line of vampires they generated is in peril too.  Alasdair is out to resolve this and protect his Master.

Life does not always work the way we planned it.  As a matter of fact, it seldom does.  The one thing I think most of us hope for is to live a clean life, make our parents proud, and be reaffirmed we did our best.That is not the case with our main character Kace.  He planned to be the boxer he could be - his trainer betrayed him by giving him supplements laced with steroids.  Forget a career in boxing.  He tried to make his parents proud of him - forget that after the scandal broke about the steroids.  He was blamed as a user and he lost his will to redeem himself.  As to an affirmation he did his best, well, he killed a man when he lost his temper one drunken night.  Now Kace is really "the walking dead".  He says to Jett he died the night he killed that man, and now his focus is on making sure he pays for the death he caused.His love affair with Lyla should be what brings him out of his funk.  He feels so guilty, though, he is unable to even allow himself to be happy in love with her.  Lyla is like the other half of his soul.  They both came from the wrong side of the railroad tracks and worked to get out of the gutter.  They are raw and exposed, yet still with the spirit to continue looking for a way to move ahead.Repentance is a story that reminds us sometimes we don't have all the facts because we are blinded by our own lack of self-esteem.  We are all sinners and sometimes life just pounds us with might be insurmountable obstacles.  It is up to us to find solutions and attempt to improve our lives rather than wallow in self-pity.  This is a story of bringing hope back into our lives and doing the best we can with our circumstances.

The Episodes continue and this town is definitely on my list!  It must be in the water they drink... now it is Lacey's turn to become the little monster we all thought she could be.She is tight with Mallory.  They are best friends forever.  Yet, when it comes to Luis, Lacey is willing to throw her friendship away to gain Luis' interest.  Mallory is so trusting.  All these characters have enough trouble going on in their lives without the added pressure of a triangle. I have yet to find one character with fully redeeming qualities except for Mrs. Alvarez.The heat is on and it is about to get hotter!

4.5 out of 5 StarsThis review is for the entire Frost Trilogy.  I own the first two books.  The third book was given to me by the author, in exchange for an honest review.Nick was a man adrift when he met Mia for the first time.  At thirty-five years of age, he had spent his entire existence making all the money he could in order to fill his life.  He also played hard -wine, women, and drugs providing a temporary oblivion to the emptiness of his life.At twenty-five, Mia was just starting to assert herself and build a life. After a harrowing breakup with her college boyfriend, she realizes she needs to make up for the five years she lost in a bad relationship and protect her heart.Our author has created an erotic love affair that will sweep your hearts away.  Chemistry does not even begin to describe the attraction between these lovers.  For Nick, meeting Mia is like meeting his fate or finding the missing piece of the puzzle that is his life.  He has many secrets he will not share with anyone.  This is his burden.  He also recognizes that Mia will not linger around with him unless full honesty is part of the foundation of their relationship.  But, can he gamble telling her his secrets?  What if she leaves him - can he survive?Mia also has a past she would rather bury and forget.  Growing up with a greedy and unattentive mother, losing her father, and now the final blow of her break up with her boyfriend, she is not eager to share her innermost secrets with Nick  No matter how much she tries to resist him, she is unable to keep her heart from falling for him.Throughout the trilogy, we get to experience how their relationship and trust builds, is torn down, is rebuilt, only to be torn down again.  Their ups and downs, fighting, and the obstacles that life throws their way provide challenges these two lovers must navigate through.  Their love is tested and in the end... Well, I will leave you to find out for yourselves what the ultimate outcome turns our to be.  All is not assured.  Just when they thought they had made it, the past comes back to haunt them.

4.5 out of 5 StarsThis review is for the entire Frost Trilogy.  I own the first two books.  The third book was given to me by the author, in exchange for an honest review.Nick was a man adrift when he met Mia for the first time.  At thirty-five years of age, he had spent his entire existence making all the money he could in order to fill his life.  He also played hard -wine, women, and drugs providing a temporary oblivion to the emptiness of his life.At twenty-five, Mia was just starting to assert herself and build a life. After a harrowing breakup with her college boyfriend, she realizes she needs to make up for the five years she lost in a bad relationship and protect her heart.Our author has created an erotic love affair that will sweep your hearts away.  Chemistry does not even begin to describe the attraction between these lovers.  For Nick, meeting Mia is like meeting his fate or finding the missing piece of the puzzle that is his life.  He has many secrets he will not share with anyone.  This is his burden.  He also recognizes that Mia will not linger around with him unless full honesty is part of the foundation of their relationship.  But, can he gamble telling her his secrets?  What if she leaves him - can he survive?Mia also has a past she would rather bury and forget.  Growing up with a greedy and unattentive mother, losing her father, and now the final blow of her break up with her boyfriend, she is not eager to share her innermost secrets with Nick  No matter how much she tries to resist him, she is unable to keep her heart from falling for him.Throughout the trilogy, we get to experience how their relationship and trust builds, is torn down, is rebuilt, only to be torn down again.  Their ups and downs, fighting, and the obstacles that life throws their way provide challenges these two lovers must navigate through.  Their love is tested and in the end... Well, I will leave you to find out for yourselves what the ultimate outcome turns our to be.  All is not assured.  Just when they thought they had made it, the past comes back to haunt them.

We all know that opposites attract.  The attraction is not the problem.  The problem is how to exist with an opposite when half the time you want to choke them?Summer is lingering away her life in that little town of Quincy when Cole descends like a force of Nature on them.  Yes, there is physical attraction, after all, he is a gorgeous Hollywood star!  Once she sees first hand how over indulged and spoiled he is, her description of him would no longer be just "gorgeous".  It would definitely include a**hole!Cole is having a meltdown in his personal life.  Being in a town where there are no hotels to speak of, no Starbucks, and the crickets sing too loud at night, is definitely sending him off his ledge.  No assistant either after Justin's accident.  He is a man who has not had to take care of anything personal for 13 years... how will he survive?I found this book amusing, entertaining, hilarious, and romantic.  Could not put it down!  Two opposites who deal with their attraction by learning from each other and meeting somewhere in the middle.  Their lives are complicated further by their goals.  Each is stubborn and unflinching.  It takes a lot of good humor and fights for these two to compromise. Oh, but when they do compromise and let their feelings soar... what a story!

The final book in The Secret Life of Amy Bensen is as remarkable as the other installments.Life on the run has sharpened Amy's instincts and no matter what Liam tries to do, this is a "spidey sense" she will never lose. "Burying" Chad was hard enough knowing it may be a long time before she is able to see him again. She has lived such a lonely life for the last 6 years, when will the terror end. Betrayal, secrets, greed, and powerful men who will stop at nothing have been part of her daily struggle for so long, how do stop running and fearing what may be around the corner?Liam is all she needs to feel safe. It is amazing what this man will do for her to keep her safe. I just loved how he works things out to give her the happiness she craves.This has been an amazing series! Our author once again proves she is at the top of her game writing these suspenseful, thrilling love stories that keep us up late at night.
Looks very professional.  Plenty of room with compartments to protect electronics.  Very pleased!I received this product from seller to test and review.

Two wonderful short stories in this book.Although both share the same premise- NO STRINGS ATTACHED, no relationships, therefore, no hurt- these stories explore the feelings and outcomes of throwing away the no strings rule and falling in love.Both stories are a poignant reminder of the obstacles  we sometimes have to face in order to fight for True Love.  These independent women want to stand on their own two feet.  Both have inner strength but very different financial circumstances.  Moving on and dealing with the consequences of a love affair can take different paths.  The issue at heart is discovering what is a priority and standing firm.Poignant and gripping, both stories are great reads!

4.5 out of 5 StarsRockers are my weakness! When the adrenalin is high from crowd adulation these guys will do and say just about anything.  Foul-mouthed, raw and over-sexed, Memphis Black is well on his way to achieving his dreams. His story is told with the help of the rest of his band.  They are all unique characters in their own right with their own stories.A childhood friend and his sister's bestie, Tallia comes to stay with the band and her friend Madison during their well-deserved vacation between tours.  Memphis is immediately taken back at the change in Tallia.  She has grown into an amazingly beautiful woman - no longer the shy, awkward, kinky haired child he remembers.Their love courtship is both funny and poignant.  Bad rocker boy and preacher's daughter find themselves drawn to each other and expanding their childhood crushes into an adult relationship.  Getting there is not only fun but also mind-blowing.  Their conscience does not hold back murmuring what the correct path for their love affair should be.  Secrets that keep them apart will be blown open and these two characters will have to grow up in a hurry and deal with their lives.Note in passing - I had to look up what a Dolphin piercing is.  This author never ceases to surprise!

If you are reading this series, you are one of the lucky readers to have discovered this suspenseful, erotic romance!I am so hooked to this story!  Shae continues to recover from losing Allen and finding all the secrets that were kept from her.  She drives me crazy at times when she lets her emotions rule her and she goes and does things that you can see will come back to "bite her".  Her saving grace is that she is so emotional after watching Allen plunge to his death.  After all, it has only been four months.  It feels like a lifetime because of all the turmoil around her, but her emotions are still very raw.The plot twists in this installment will have you on the edge of your seats.  I was biting my nails!  Confession time... I stayed up all night last night reading this book to its completion.  I just could not put it down.  When I finished the Sun was coming up, but I do not regret spending the time and losing the sleep.  This series blows my mind!

Never a dull moment in Candy's life.  By now, we all want to let "Maleficent" have it.  I am a peaceful person, but the things this woman has done to Candy deserve more than a slap... heck!  Where is my baseball bat?Max is still the man for me.  I am so hooked on this man!  Not only is he a great lover, but a great human being.  No wonder Candy is just nuts about him.All secrets will be revealed and tied into a neat knot.  This conclusion to the series was as exciting as the rest of the series.  It really leaves you feeling good and still wanting more from Max and Candy!I have read other series by this author and must say this series is her best!

All I can say is the room where the Fashion Archives are kept is XXX Rated.  Give thanks the door has a lock!By now Max and Candy cannot stay away from each other.  It is high time they let their secret out because when those two are in close proximity, anything around will automatically combust from the heat they generate!Things are getting serious between these two.  Candy needs to finally believe Max is serious.  Girl, this man has spent more money in ripped panties than the bottles of Dom Perignon you two are guzzling down.It is now time for the final twist in the plot... the death of Candy's parents... was it really an accident?

Whenever I read a book where a child is abused, I react strongly to it.  Deep Night is such a story.  Artfully written, our author presents us with characters that have endured pain both physical or emotional and the impact it has to their lives.Sara presents herself as an adult fully ready to engage obstacles at full speed.  This is a front.  Behind that tough exterior is a fragile child living with the emotional upheaval of parental abuse.  She is a remarkable character to study and experience this story with.  What happens to a person who has survived sexual abuse?  Are they able to live a fulfilling life as an adult and experience closeness with a partner?  What does it take to make that intangible connection to partner?Chris is our hero.  With all his flaws, he is a protector seeking his place in the world after serving in Afghanistan.  After all he has survived, including physical and emotional injuries, he still holds on to life and the desire to make something better of what he has been given.  His drive to survive is admirable while he faces the consequences of his injuries.PTSD affects all victims, some more than others.  The plight of victims to survive the outcome of their injuries is the undercurrent of this book.  From Miller who is the soldier without a future, to Chris the protector in quest to a better life, all these characters will tug at your hearts.

Great hub!  Fast response time.  Great addition to my computer for the ever expanding need for USB connections.  One problem only which is the cord to connect is super short.  I can see using this with a laptop, but if you need it for a desktop, get yourselves an extension.
Great gadget with plenty of storage for all my documents.  Would not live without it!
3M you have a winner here!  It repositions easily, cleans up fabulously, and does its job.  I also found out that batteries will last me longer because of the light background.  Who knew?
Super convenient!  Just a few basic cards and id, a little money, fits right in my jeans and I am good to go.  No bulky items to carry when you are going out and just want to have fun.  Perfect!
This is a perfect sewing kit for travelers.  Not too small just large enough to include a nice sampling of threads and all the essentials.  I love this!

Are you a fan of the original STAR WARS trilogy? Then, you will fit right in with Adam and the lovely Solo. Yes, she is a girl but with two dads that worship Harrison Ford. What else would they have called their daughter?Our two main characters are very young... barely in their twenties. They are mature for their age, but let's face it, they are still young and fragile. With all the pressures on Adam to come up with money to pay his mother's medical bills, he has no choice than to do erotic modeling. What is that you say? Next time you look at a hottie in their briefs where little is left to the imagination you will know. Let's face it! We all look for the tattoos, the flexed muscles, the magical "V", pecs of a Hercules, and sometimes we even glance below the belt and go WOW! Yep! That is what our gorgeous Adam has signed up for in order to make money fast.Solo just happens to be the social media guru working for the photographer who has hired Adam. She is a gorgeous, petite girl who is very careful with these models. She does not want her broken again.Now that I have set the stage for you, imagine all the possibilities for frolic and enjoyment when these two are mixed together. This author gives a gentle and sometimes risque story where the courtship is hot and the emotions run hot.Definitely a good book to escape everyday life!

I received an ARC from a new author by the name of Cole Saint James. The book is called The Heart Breaker. As I already started reading it and must say I was VERY IMPRESSED. It had a great unique storyline, well-written, surprisingly sensitive and erotic at the same time.As I continued to read, I realized how deeply in tune the author was with his characters. The emotions, perils, and dreams of the characters in this book were all exposed in a way I could not help but be involved. This is a sensual book too, but it is not your typical sex on every page book. It goes deeper. It felt like the author was courting the readers with details about the main characters and creating the anticipation they would feel when faced with a new love interest. By the time the lovers consummate their need, you understand their reactions and feel the blossoming emotions with every word you read.I am so glad I was able to read this author's work! I will be following his career from now on. A man that can be this in tune with his emotions and write about his fictional characters in such a style is a romantic and worth reading. I love romance!

TRUST is a commodity Chad cannot afford to give. He trusts no one, except his best friend Jared and his sister Amy. If you have been reading this series, you know by now that Chad has spent the last six years running and dodging the men who will stop at nothing to retrieve the cylinder he found. Now with his parents dead, these killers after him, and Amy in danger, he is faced with the fact he must find a solution to this problem once and for all.To use the common cliche of "rollercoaster ride" does not even begin to express the turmoil Chad is going through. Saved by a beautiful stranger, unable to trust her, knowing someone has betrayed his whereabouts and facing torture are but a few of the highlights.Once again, Lisa Renee Jones takes us on a magic carpet ride with this gripping story. Nail-biting, at the edge of your seats thrills and a scorching hot seductive love affair is what you are in for. Watch for the plot twists and be amazed. One more book remains in this thrilling series. Unbroken is promised for September of this year, so we only have one more month to wait for the final conclusion. Will these couples survive?

Waking up with no memories of who you are must be not only disconcerting but paralyzing. This is how our Jane Doe starts to live her new life. Beaten, pummeled within an inch of her life, and left in a dumpster to meet her maker, she is brought back to life. The police cannot find any reports of missing persons in the entire State of Florida. Her fingerprints are not in file. No one can tell if she is a minor ... what is her age?  Homeless, hungry and at death's door, Jane Doe meets Brantley King on the day of his release from jail. While friends are partying around them, Doe is looking for food peace and quiet when they meet. Like a thunderbolt, King realizes she is different and is the one for him. Their courtship is shocking and unconventional to say the least. Their connection is unavoidable, and once King allows Doe to see behind his facade, the two of them cannot deny what is happening between them.This is the gripping story of two lost souls who in a very unconventional way , reach out to each other and bond.  Reading this book made me think about the bonds we make as human beings.  We are born into a family we did not choose to begin with.  As our lives unfold, we get the chance to bring into our "family" people we grow to love, respect and admire.  This "family" we choose for ourselves is the most powerful support system we can possibly have in life.  More than blood connection, this is the family we created with our life experiences.  Their members are the ones who will stand fast by our sides in times of trouble and in times of joy.Be aware our characters are part of an underworld of drugs, murderers, and lawless characters. They are a law within themselves. Their world is one of kill or be killed, yet they are human beings too, with all the dreams they dare to hope for.  I read this at one sitting because I was unable to put this book down. It is gut-wrenching. If you enjoy plotlines with an edge, this book is for you.
Great matts, delivered in excellent protective packaging. I've ordered many items from Craig Frames and have had the same excellent experience each time.
Great matts, delivered in excellent protective packaging. I've ordered many items from Craig Frames and have had the same excellent experience each time.
Does everything I had hoped it would.  Only problem is that the rubberized plastic holder within covers the power and volume buttons making them difficult to use.

Not as stiff as I had hoped, but serviceable.  The fusible glue is also not great (impossible to get a clean bubble-free finish on any fabric type I tried: silk dupioni, silk organza, wool, cotton, and nylon), so I simply fused it as well as I could to silk organza and used it as a sewn in interlining.  The silk organza + the interlining was the appropriate weight hair canvas for very thin wool or silk dupioni.

My fine hair was lightened and there was breakage.  There was frizz.  There was more breakage later, and an overall rough texture even after weeks of deep conditioning treatments.After one use of this product for the recommended 5 minutes, it felt more like my virgin growth... bendy, slippery, and less frizzy.  After 3 uses, it feels almost like I never colored or lightened my hair at all, other the broken pieces being shorter.  I am *very* happy!
Works well, and it doesn't compress as quickly as larger "beans" since there is less air space between balls.

I've got level 8-9 gold blonde hair (lightened) and this stuff leaves a very pretty, sparkly, rose gold color throughout.  It veers a bit toward pink rather than copper, which I like!  It also deposits within seconds, rather than needing heat or time to penetrate.  My hands came out clean, so it's not very staining on skin or fingernails.I don't find that it dries out my hair as other users have, and mine tends toward being dry and frizzy, but I use very good conditioners, so maybe that's what is needed.

My dogs love these things. They're picky greyhounds with knobby elbows, so they typically don't care too much for thin beds over hard flooring, but they regularly lay on these even when they're just in the house on the hardwood.Very easy to fold in half, roll, then stuff into the provided sack for travel.  They also wash perfectly as long as you hang them up to dry.

My wrist measures 5.5" around, and the small/medium brace meant for 5-8" wrists is almost too large. I have to pull the strap to its furthest point and the velcro barely has anything left to "hook" to.  It is also a bit loose around the hand, so I would love a XS/Small version of this even more.  That said, it feels good on and helps with the tingling and aching, especially when I wear it over night. It's very lightweight, so I don't notice it, and it is slim enough not to stretch my sweater sleeves out much.  When wearing long sleeves, it's hard to tell you're wearing anything except "hand warmer" inner sleeves (like the kind that come in athletic long sleeve gear).There's an inner "sock" of thin fabric that goes under the velcro straps to make it even more comfortable. Well planned.
Not off white, but more of a cement grey color. I still like it, and it works in my room, but I was not expecting this paint color when I ordered.
Keeps hot drinks just as hot as when it was poured, even with the cap open for drinking.  Easy to drink from without unscrewing the top.

Works better than my Shark navigator, and has all the right parts to clean carpet and hard flooring perfectly.  The dusting mit attachment is amazing on hardwood, since the brush only gets up larger particles, not fine dust.The suction is quite good, and the weight is also decent for using on the whole house.  Dust bunnies go flying toward the vacuum from a foot away.The flexibility of the brush head makes doing stairs very easy, without changing attachments.The filter is very simple and easy to clean/disinfect.  No need to buy refill products.Cons:  The collection basket is somewhat small. In a pet household can only do one room at a time before I need to empty the bin.The cord and motor assembly are attached to the bin, so it is a little bit awkward to empty (and the release latch placement may get dust on your hands).

Far more bronze than red, and not at all blonde.  My hair was a light level 9 blonde and I wanted to go back to light reddish blonde.  This color is far more brown/bronze than it is red or copper, and about level 7 in darkness.  I was pretty disappointed. Within a week, you're left with just the boring brown and what little red/copper there was washes away.

Does not align properly with the print head alignment, and the black smears through the document no matter how many print head cleanings you do, or how many times you remove it to swab down the non-inking portions of the cartridge.The color ink aligns poorly, and never quite lines up to fill in the whole test block. But, it will print office documents well enough. I would NOT use these for any photo printing or anything that needs to come out without artifact black dots/streaks/patches.

About 1/2 of these feet do not work with my machine, and they should, given it is Janome that takes basic Singer feet.  I expected the short-ankle feet not to work, but the simple snap in ones should all work.  There is either too much room under the foot for it to grab the feeder teeth below, or too little space to slide even 2 thin layers of chiffon. Not good.However, the price for the feet that *do* work is cheaper than buying the feet individually, so I give this set 2 stars rather than one.

Set #15  The colors are all thin and take 3x as long as the regular sets to cure.  They're also blacklight reactive, so the colors are a bit pasty.  4 of the colors are identical in daylight (neon red/orange).  I got two greens that are idenical in daylight, and the dark purple is so dark it is black.  THe blue is actually peacock teal, not sky blue, and the yellow is extra transparent.  Not thrilled with the "surprise" that they're of lesser quality to get the mid-90's blacklight reaction.  These cure bendy and soft rather than firm like the other colors I've gotten, so they're less durable too.
Wow, that arrived impressively quickly! Just what I needed to make beanbag cube ottomans. Cheap, clean, and easy!

Works great for a narrow person, but is uncomfortable for wider shoulders. Great length for a tall person (6'2" fits perfectly) but the width means your shoulders are resting on the metal support bars.  Because the fabric works similarly to a hammock, the bars are a little higher than the fabric platform, creating a metal lip your shoulders rest on if you're not a small person.  Measure the width of your back and shoulders before buying this one.  If you'll fit, or you sleep on your side, this is a great cot for the price. It's light enough, but only folds in half, making it large, so be forewarned!

Works exactly as intended for UV/LED gel polish curing with near zero heat output, and infinitesimally small amounts of UV exposure on the skin. (Would take 40,000 ten-minutes uses to equal one phototherapy session).  Make sure your polish is actually intended to be cured with LED UV light, or it will not cure at all.The light stays on for 32 seconds, which is long enough to cure a thin layer of most resin polishes. Do 2 "rounds" to be sure, but I have not found a resin that required longer than 60 seconds.  If you are annoyed with the design only allowing you to cure 4 nails at once, pick up the unit and curl your wet nails into a "claw" shape so they are all 5 facing up. Shine the light onto all 5.  If you want to do all 5 with your hand flat against a table, you will need a much larger lamp unit.  I appreciate how small and light this one is, and will gladly hold it in one hand to cure 5 nails at once.

Smells like the base scent (citrusy) with vanilla and lavender added.  Nice scent, and it works well enough to cover over stinkiness. Travel size is great. You need less than the 5-6 pumps it recommends unless the bowl uses a lot of water.
Just what I needed for pirate themed cupcakes. Not much else to say!
Works fine. I wouldn't expect to clean up fine dust particles with this, or anything as heavy as wood chips, but it cleans up the sand on our patio and small leaf bits better than a broom.
Tastes excellent, but does nothing for my sensitivity; however, it doesn't make it worse like most regular pastes do.  Sensodyne does a better job but tastes terrible so I swap between the two kinds.

Missing one of the colors and not 100% as pictured, but close enough to make me happy.  All of the colors are darker than the swatches and less vibrant, but they are still pretty and cure beautifully.  The dark silver is really quite black (with some dark silver glitter).  The pinks are all very similar and bronze hued. The light silver is cement grey, and there is no cream/pearl colored polish.

Real feet intended to be used on Janome. This means they also work on a huge range of clip in foot machines, like all my Brother and Singer models with standard feet.The fabric rolls very consistently and tightly. Just be sure to clip away any fuzzy frayed edges as you go and keep the cut edge clean. It works well on curves, but less perfectly, so be prepared to stabilize the bias direction of your curves if you need a perfect flat finish.
Great antiseptic rinse that also lubricates. It's very good for cleaning and flushing sensitive parts of your pets when they need it. The only con is that it is heavily perfumed.

Does not discolor or leak dye like many of the deeply pigmented wrappers do. They're also thick enough not to deform in the muffin tins or ruin their accordion folding when you separate them.  A great bargain if you make lots of cupcakes. They look very classy on chocolate cupcakes
Tissue thin, but very comfy and pretty.  It's great under a corset and over leggings.

As a theatre costumer, I am picky about the type of details shown in design books. This book has so many beautifully detailed drawings to use for design. Lots of different styles, underwear, outerwear, and kid's items. Lovely!

Heavy, sturdy, very easy to install.  The screw-clamp portion of this device is all plastic (the nut and the threaded rod it goes onto), but it is about 3" longer than most of the lightweight cheapie versions of soap pumps available in the big box stores.  This makes it a lot easier to install, plus the clamp nut is designed to be tightened by hand with finger "wings" to push/grab. The cheap versions need a wrench, and if you've tried to install one of these with a wrench after a sink is installed in the counter, you will appreciate the finger--tightening nut.  There simply isn't enough room to get your hands plus a wrench in there without being made of rubber.  Hansgrohe clearly designed around this difficulty as well as they could.The metal portion of the pump is very heavy and sturdy and the nozzle is long enough to get the soap into the sink rather than onto the counter; another shortfall of the cheap versions.

I got the XL (size 11-14) for my husband's 13 double-wide feet. They were about an inch too long in the foot bed, and still too big after washing.  They are beautiful, but if you aren't a true size 14/15, they will be quite large!  I don't want to wash them in very hot water to shrink them since the yarn dyes will fade too quickly.
I'll be using this for body products, since it smells lovely, but it tastes strongly of moldy earth, so it cannot be used for lip balm or cooking.

Tastes more like real oranges than the DaVinci or Torani orange syrups, and has muc less of an artificial sweetener kick. Plus, no fake orange colorant, which I especially appreciate.  Very sweet, mild orange flavor. Not strongly flavored like orange rind, and no acidity.If it was a bit more orange-peel "orangey" like triple sec, it would be 5 stars.

Very tasty. It has very little artificial sweetener taste, a bit of tartness, and lots of berry and lemon. Really delicious in carbonated water!  I was worried it might taste like a chewable children's vitamin, but it tastes just like strawberry lemonade.

A savior for drought stricken trees without good irrigation.  These bags have saved several trees on my property that were not getting enough water through the in-ground irrigation. They have also allowed me to plant trees in places I cannot irrigate properly.  All of the trees that were dropping their leaves early from heat and water stress have bounced back to full and I no longer have to worry about wasted runoff water from hose-watering. The water empties slowly enough that very little is wasted, even on my burmed (elevated) plantings.

One of the hole punches is out of alignment, so it cannot be used.  I bought this for the 2 hole punch sizes, so it's only marginally useful now.  Unfortunately, I waited too long to try that particular punch hole and could not return it.
This was a gift for two sisters, and they went nuts for them. They spent hours looking for things to pick up, including messy toys and all the gift wrapping.

Be aware, you probably cannot use these to bake cupcakes free standing like you can in better quality silicone baking cups. They are too thin to hold their shape with the weight of batter in them.  However, they perform beautifully within the confines of a muffin pan.  I should have guessed this by the image (light shows through the edges of the top cup, so it is obviously thin).

1) Sound quality on PCs was terrible.  Even before you speak, it transmits a load of loud electrical humming. When you do speak, it hums over you.  There were no windows settings that altered this, and it was the same on two very different windows machines. Window recording device settings, etc, did nothing to curb the hum.  I tried connecting it through multiple USB dock locations and then several different intermediary USB device as suggested, and it was still terrible.  Using the device wired or wireless was equally bad.2) Pain in the backside to synch. It took over an hour of doing as the manual directed to get the headset to synch to the receiver, despite being only a foot or so away from each other.  I don't know why it finally worked, but it needed to be resynched after each power-down, each time taking several minutes.3) The head band is too large for a woman or smaller man's head. The ear cups hang off the top of your ears unsupported by the head band. It is not adjustable.4) The manual is a joke, and you need software for some windows machines that is not supplied in the box. You'll need to download the proper Turtle Beach wizard for your machine to detect the device.  The manual supplies very little information and simply assumes you plug the thing in and it works.  If you're running windows 8, this will likely not be the case.I get better sound transmission quality from a $5 headset I bought to fill the gap until I could order a better one. Truly disappointing.
Lots of eras of styles, all of which could be completed by someone with minimal wig/hair styling experience.  Great step by photos.
Beautiful fun blue and a tight fitting lid. Not much else I could ask for! The grippy bottom is a bonus. It looks nice enough to use as a serving bowl as needed.

XXL is barely big enough for a medium sized greyhound's chest. The front of the chest/neck area is designed oddly, so the front arm holes are set very far back. You can see it a bit on the pug in the photo, and it's made much worse on a larger dog.  The arm holes pinch a bit in the front due to this design, but we mainly wanted the shirt for a photo.Our dog couldn't walk in the shirt without it binding his front legs, so be aware it might not be useful for more than quick costume photo use.The XXL covered about 2/3 of my dog's length, so I'm thinking it would look right on a 50-60lb dog.

When they say "basic" they really mean "mainly instructions on ultra-basic sewing in general" rather than specific guidance for making hats. Most of this book covers things like how to read a pattern, defining fabric types, how to do slip and basting stitches, and how to twist two ends of wire together... There is very little on any specific hat, like basic patterns or explicit directions on making any item.This book went directly to the library as a donation.
Hilarious birthday gift for a Trekie dog owner. It actually looks really good in person, and loads easily through an all-around-the-edge zipper.

Nice lemon-lime flavor similar to the lemon gatorade, but without the sweetener and a whole lot more potassium, magnesium, and sodium.  Dissolves very quickly.My distance running family members use these packets after their long runs to replace sodium. There isn't "too much" potassium that it would cause a problem for healthy people, so it's a great all-around product to have in the house.If you are on a very-low-carbohydrate diet, you no longer store potassium, sodium, and magnesium at useful levels, but one packet of this stuff will get you nearly all of what you need to replace. Compared to potassium supplements which are legally capped (in the US) at 3% RDA, this is much better!

25H613 (Honey blonde with bleach blonde highlights) came as entirely color 613 (bleach blonde). There were no color variations in it, even in bright sunlight.  The bag was labeled correctly, but either the wrong one was in the bag, or the actual item differs greatly from description or photo.

This colorant sticks to my hair better than most brands, which works fabulously for toning down yellow in blonde air. After 2 weeks, I still have silver color in my blonde hair, while other direct dyes (and Shimmer Lights and L'Oreal Silver shampoos) are long gone.I mix this with conditioner for a transparent weak dye and it still tends to turn blue-purple. It's really strong! Used at full strength, it should color most blonde hues a vivid orchid purple.

!This stuff is ground so finely it is almost like corn starch. That makes for the most amazing silky Burmese Tofu and chickpea bread.  I have used Bob's Red Mill brand garbanzo bean flour, and it makes a much grittier product.Spicy World's version is much cheaper per pound, and in my opinion is a superior product.

Works on fine, straight, thin (but very dry) hair. Scalp and hair gets clean, without feeling at all greasy.  Also, you don't have to use as much product per use as the "Wen" system requires, so a bottle should last a while.The shampoo reminds me of Noxema face cleanser, or cold cream; it feels a bit cool, and it cleanses, but isn't soapy. The scent is quite medicinal (with a strong hit of lemon grass) and it lingers, in case perfumes bother you.  The conditioner feels like normal conditioner, but it rinses out better than most without a greasy feel.My not-curly hair is chemically damaged, so it needs a lot of moisture to keep it from looking and feeling dry. Silicones in normal conditioner mask the problem for a while, but actually make the internal dryness worse.  This set works much better, and doesn't just mask the problem with a coating of shine. My hair is shinier with this stuff than it ever was with silicone balms, mists, or conditioners, and much softer.If your hair is extra dry, tangly, or has natural texture you want to enhance, I would suggest using a little bit of the conditioner in your towel dried hair for detangling and softness. The rinse-out steps do rinse out clean, so you may need that last "no rinse" step.
I wear a women's XS or S (size 4) and I bought the "large".  It fits well through the bust, shoulders, and hips, but is a bit too generous though the waist if you're girly shaped.

I bought this to use as a Wednesday Adams costume, and it is just perfect.  The sizing was spot on (check the measurement indicators the seller lists) and the fabric was heavy enough that it's not at all see-through or too panty-revealing.My only complaint is that the shaping darts in the front are sewn badly. The top point of this dart should end at the apex of the breast, and it ended 2" higher than the underarm seam. (Not even a 14 year old has "girls" that perky! haha).  I was able to re-sew this to make it less awkward looking.The stitching for the cuffs and collar are well done and clean.

Turned my light yellow hair a more natural hue.  I bleached my hair to remove red colorants, but still had some very pale (level 9 or so) orange and yellow.  This toner is very strong, so do be careful to monitor it, especially if you have very light or porus hair. It can go extra blue-ish if you leave it on too long for your hair.  I only needed 10 minutes, and nearly a month later, it's still keeping my yellow areas more neutral to ashy blonde.

Anorexic dog takes this, and licks the bowl sparkling clean.  My senior hound recently lost most of her interest in food (kibble, canned, puppy food, home cooked, you name it), and after making sure there was nothing obviously medical wrong with her, I still needed a way to get enough calories into her. This stuff works well! She loves it, just mixed with a little water to thin it out. It's the only edible thing she will lick the bowl for, and she makes sure to get it all. :)

Much lower in calories than the other rolls of this brand, and filled with wheat flour. For example, the feeding guideline for a large dog on this log reads 3" of the roll if you're mixing it with dry food, and 6" for full-feeding.  6" is HUGE on this size log!  The grain free versions are 3" per day for full feeding, or 0.75" for mixing with dry.  3/4" of an inch vs 3"? That's a lot of calorie light filler in there, and it's not cheap!Also, the other rolls are grain free.  This one is too full of cheap ingredients to be worthwhile... basically dietary sawdust to bulk it out.

Really great at sucking up leaves directly from rubber bark mulch and pea gravel if you're careful. The vacuum bag seems well built to me, but I haven't used it for more than a year yet.The blower's multiple speeds are great. More than enough to blow sand out of the grooves of concrete or decking, and it'll blow dry leaves quite a ways.  The only trouble you'll have is with wet sticky leaves; those don't move very well if they're stuck to stones, concrete, or mulch.Easy to use. I suggest a heavy duty gauge extension cord if you need more than 50 feet of length. The power seemed to dwindle a bit using a medium-duty cord.Quieter than gas powered blowers, by far, but still noisy. Not something you want to use at 5am on a weekend if you have neighbors, but it's a big step up from exhaust clouds and 2-stroke engine noise.

This is the 4th one of these our family has purchased. They now have fully replaced all of our other pitchers because these fit so well in the fridge door and can even be stored on their sides.  They seal perfectly, so making powdered drink mixes or quickly icing hot tea is very clean and easy.My favorite part: everything comes apart to be cleaned, and there are no tricky spots to scrub. The opening is big enough for even a large hand to get into.  My only possible complaint is our white-plastic version looks dirty really quickly and can stain from cheap red food coloring.

Can be mounted on the wall with the addition of two small eyehooks or something similar.I just wish I bought a second one; after inheriting my grandmother's sewing supplies, I didn't realize I had so many spools of thread!If you are using it on a table top, be aware that there is nothing to "catch" the legs in place once extended. If you shove too hard you will collapse the legs back into "folded" and it will fall over.

I bought 100 of these tins to organize my beading and jewelry making supplies. I have a lot of little odds and ends, for sure!  These tins paired with a label printing gadget (bought one on Amazon for $15) turned 5 drawers of plastic packets and odd sorting trays into 1 small drawer of tidy little boxes.  I turn them on their sides to label them so I can see at a glance what is in the box, plus the clear window when you pull it out shows you clearly what is left.My chainmaile supplies and leather working rivets/grommets/etc all got sorted as well. Now I don't have to dig looking for the right thing mixed up with others, I just scan the labels. :)

I really like this labeler. It've very easy to use, and the basic labels it uses are quite sticky. (Sticks well to metal, fabric, wood, glass).My only gripe is that it occasionally "paper jams" the ribbon (like once or twice in the while spool length).
Very detailed! I love my tiny little monstrosity.

Dark Places by Gillian Flynn is a 2009 publication.After reading Gone Girl, I was chomping at the bit to read more from this author.  I dived into Sharp  Objects,  and it was good too,  just very different.  But, as time passed, I forgot about this book, and it sat on my TBR list for a long, long time.A few weeks ago I was browsing through Amazon prime movies and noticed this book has been made into a movie starring Charlize Theron. What? I had no idea.  Well, I didn't even bother looking at the ratings or reading the reviews for it, but instead, I went in search of the book, remembering suddenly that I had been excited to read it a few years back.I really don't know what to say or how to feel about this book.  It certainly doesn't measure up to  the other books I've read by this author.The story is just very busy and  complicated, and the flashbacks delved too deeply into matters that didn't pertain to the story all that much and didn't add much insight, which took me out of the story.  I really struggled to stay interested and had to exercise all my self control not to skim or skip ahead.Libby survives a vicious attack on her family that leaves her mother and two sisters dead, and her brother in prison accused of the crime.  Now, in  her thirties,  Libby is flat broke, so when she is approached by a Kill Club a group of people obsessed with notorious murder cases, she sees a chance to cash in on her tragedy.  She is stunned to discover that many people in the group are not convinced her brother, Ben, is guilty,  something she has taken at face value all these years.After hearing some the contradictions in the case, Libby begins to have second thoughts about Ben's guilt , and with the help of a group member, she begins to piece together what really happened to her family all those years ago, and it's not as cut and dried as she had thought.Is Ben innocent or did he have an accomplice?  Was it a stranger to the family, or an enemy of her father's or someone seeking revenge for an alleged crime.. or all of the above?  Libby's journey will take her to many dark places before she's able to see the light.This book has the trademark twist and turns that we expect from this author, and the very dark subject matter, too.  Gillian Flynn is a master at writing books in which none of the main characters are all that likeable.  I wanted to like Libby, pull for her, cheer her on, and see her finally find closure, but she was not exactly the warmest person in the world and certainly has her own foibles.It seems that nearly all the characters were morally bankrupt in one way or another, some more than others.  So, if you are one of the few who hasn't read this book yet, don't expect things to turn out rosy in the end with everything tied up nice and tidy with a big bow on top.This is one weird story, but it does, in a strange way, have a modern day noir feel to it, however, if that was what the author was going for, it didn't quite work.  I  ended up feeling irritated at the pacing of the story, and after all that frustration, I wasn't exactly jumping for joy when I got to the end.As a side note, after finishing the book, I did go back to see what people thought of the movie, and the general consensus was that it's an okay movie, maybe a little above average, according to Amazon reviewers, so out of curiosity, I might give it a try and see what Hollywood's take is on this very odd story.I'm still on the fence about my rating, but will settle for a 2.5 rounded to 3

Dead in her Tracks by Kendra Elliot is a 2015 Montlake Publication.  I was provided a copy of this book by the publisher and Netgalley in exchange for an honest review.This is the second book in the Rogue Winter novella arc.  The first book is Track of Her Tears by Melinda Leigh and I highly recommend reading it first, if possible, since the two stories tie in together.  However, this one can be read a stand alone too.Zane and Stevie have their hands full on Christmas day when the body of a young girl is found in a seedy motel room and the prime suspect is already sitting in jail.  When a shocking and unexpected hitch in the case occurs, Zane and Stevie must start all over at square one to determine who is killing young women in Solitude.On the personal side of things Zane is finally getting Stevie to consider taking the next step in their relationship, especially now that Stevie sees her mother's predictions seem to be accurate after all. This is another well written, fast paced thriller by Kendra Elliot, and for such a short story,  this one packs a solid punch.  This is certainly not your typical holiday reading, that's for sure.But, never fear, there are a few lighter moments and some really sweet romantic gestures too, which will put all the lurid crime elements into perspective in the end.I really love this series and hope to see a lengthier novel- or two- in the near future.

Tracks of her Tears by Melinda Leigh  A Rogue Winter Novella is a 2015  Montlake publication.  I was provided a copy of this book by the publisher and Netgalley in exchange for an honest review.It  is the holiday season in Solitude, Oregon, but it's anything but merry and bright.  When Carly's brother, Bruce goes missing and his girlfriend is found murdered, it's up to Seth, to solve the case and keep his family safe.It seems like it's been a long time since I have touched base with this series, so I was happy to see a pair of novellas coming out this month- this one from Melinda Leigh and Dead in Her Tracks By Kendra Elliot.This story reunites us with Seth and Carly, who are back together and making their marriage the top priority is their lives now.  But, when Bruce's girlfriend is found murdered,  they find it hard to find balance in their personal lives, especially when a young child is left without parents.This is one action packed story, though,  a little gritty, and pretty realistic as the author showcases just how dumb criminals can be and the horrible consequences of their actions.I was happy to touch base with Seth and Carly, and am thankful that this couple are working things out, and that for once, Seth didn't get on my last nerve. He is really coming along, and showed that he can stick to his guns when it comes to trusting his wife and letting her do her job, just like he has to do his.  The pair actually worked together on this one and make a pretty darned good team, if you ask me.While the circumstances are sad for many concerned, there is a bright ray of light that  we see shining through in the end and it looks like Carly, Seth and Brianna will have a very Merry Christmas!

Little House Living: The Make Your Own Guide to a Frugal, Simple, Self-Sufficient Life by Merissa Alink is a 2015 Gallery Books publication. I was provided a copy of this book as an XOXpert, the official street team of XOXO After Dark.I admit I grew up in the era of quick and convenient. I bought pre- mixed cake mixes and scoffed at the idea of making anything from scratch. Instead of home remedies, I bought over the counter pain relievers and cold medicines, and never would have considered making my own soap, dish detergent, or other household products.But, my daughter would tell me about making her own facial scrubs and using peppermint essential oils for various maladies, but I still never imagined myself doing any of these things myself. First of all, you have to buy all the ingredients, and when I did the math, and figured in the amount of time it would take, I figured I was just as well off buying it from the store until I got this book.First of all, it should be noted that this is not just a recipe book for cooking or food. This book has a little bit of everything in it.Body and Beauty 'do it yourself' recipes such as:Bath SaltsLip BalmHand SoapChest RubHousehold items such as:Dish SoapFloor CleanerDusting Spray and furniture polishWindow CleanerIdeas for Children and PetsDiaper Rash CreamPlay DohPet treat mixPet Flea WashAnd of course food-Make ahead mixes:cake mixHamburger help mixOnion soupHot chocolateBreadThese are just a few examples of the items listed that you can make yourself at home.Are you on a busy schedule and don't think you would have time to make your own products? This book is packed with very easy recipes for those on a busy schedule, such as deodorizer disc made out of everyday baking soda and water with a drop or two of essential oils, placed in a muffin tin and left to dry for a day or two. The disc can be placed discretely in odor prone areas of your home. It took me all of five minutes to do this, and the essential oil is not necessary. Baking soda is a natural odor absorber.The cost? Well, for some of the projects, there would have to be some investment on your part, especially if you want to put the mixtures into cute containers and such. I made the chest rub, but I didn't have a glass jar to put it in, but I did have a very small Tupperware container that worked perfectly. Most of the ingredients can be purchased at Amazon for less than buying them at a health food store, and I had no trouble finding the ingredients. A few items were a little pricey, but once I had everything I needed, I saw that I could make double, even triple, the amount of goods, which meant I saved money and time by making the items at home.The Items I Made:I made the chocolate cake mix and the cake turned out great, but it wasn't as moist I am accustomed to. But, the flavor was fantastic and there were some variants on the recipe that I may try in the future.Bath Salts:I made bath salts for colds:This is super easy-One half cup Epsom SaltsOne half cup Sea Salt ( I bought bulk, because it was cheaper)5 drops peppermint essential oil5 drops eucalyptus essential oil5 drops lavender essential oilJust mix together! That's it!I also made the chest rub which was simply coconut oil and peppermint and eucalyptus essential oils. Just stir together, and store in a container. It took less than five minutes to make this and it smells like chest rub you buy at the store. I rubbed some on the soles of my feet one day when my allergies were bothering me, and it worked wonders.As I noted earlier, I made the deodorizer disc, too. But, the disc dried out quickly and broke easily. I ended up putting some of the mix into small Dixie Cups instead.I also made the dusting spray which consisted of white vinegar and oil ( I used EVOO) and a few drops of lemon essential oil.Overall, this is a fun book and I loved how easy it was to make the products and the ingredients weren't some kind exotic stuff I could never find anywhere. I'm planning on making more of the food recipes and want to make up some of the body butter for Christmas gifts.The only disclaimer I noticed was in regards to the use of essential oils, so be sure to read the directions carefully and do not allow children to use the oils unattended, or at all if they are very young.This is a hardcover book with color pictures and illustrations on glossy paper. The sections are well organized and planned out, with step by step instructions and money saving tips.Overall, I am a happy customer and will be referring to this book often for many household items and beauty aids.

Where now is the warrior?  Where is the warhorse?  Bestowal of treasure, and sharing of feast? Alas!
